Title: Prohibits the state university of New York and the city university of New York from permitting any persons to solicit persons to become holders of credit cards unless credit education courses are provided
Summary: Prohibits the state university of New York and the city university of New York from permitting any persons to solicit persons to become holders of credit cards unless credit education courses are provided.
LawCode: Add Art 17 §§9500 & 9501, Bank L; add §§355-f & 6204-b, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law and the education law, in relation to prohibiting the state university of New York and the city university of New York from permitting any persons to solicit persons to become holders of credit cards unless credit education courses are provided
